intro.title: BUILDING MY PATH
intro.text: Passionate about programming, with junior-level experience and a strong determination to build a solid career in development. I created this page to showcase what I can do. It was built with React and Tailwind, and in the “Projects” section you’ll find work done in other programming languages I know. I hope you enjoy it. feel free to get in touch!

bio.title: Biography
bio.text: I didn’t follow a straight path, and I’m proud of it. Every change helped me see the world better. A few years ago, I found my passion for work, and with effort and dedication, I entered the field. I’m a father, and that gives more meaning to everything I do. I want to build something important that my son can be proud of. This page is where I start, not where I finish.

balance.title: Philosophies of Balance
balance.text: Eastern philosophies like Buddhism and Yin-Yang taught me that every action has weight, and that respect for oneself, others, and the world is the core of good coexistence.

culture.title: Japanese Culture
culture.text: Japanese culture with martial arts, anime, and bonsai has given me deep values such as honor, dedication, and the beauty of detail.

sport.title: Sport and Discipline
sport.text: Basketball was my first teacher of discipline. It taught me teamwork, consistency, and resilience. Leaving my country at 18 then brought me face to many challenges and responsibilities that helped me grow fast and understand myself better.
